alert.note: Alert for Norman (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 30 at 8:05PM CDT until May 04 at 10:00AM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Grand Forks ND has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Minnesota... Wild Rice River (MN) at Twin Valley affecting Norman County. .Water levels are expected to rise into Minor Flood Stage overnight and drop out of Flood stage early next week. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Wild Rice River (MN) at Twin Valley. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, MINOR FLOOD STAGE. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 9.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 10.5 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Tuesday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Safety message - Turn around, don`t drown. Don`t travel through flooded areas. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
